homeone: In 2013, a few like-minded imbibers from the West joined our brew-master in a common goal: to find a craft beer, microbrewery, or libation in Phnom Penh that was reminiscent of home.
hometwo: You, too, may have experienced a similar day with limited results. It was because of this that we took matters into our own hands and began crafting full-bodied beers with iconic aromatics and a pleasing finish.
